null-browser.title: Null browser
null-browser.description: An infinitly extensible web browser built on top of qtwebengine

chelleport.title: Chelleport
chelleport.description: App for X11 linux to control your mouse pointer with your keyboard with hints and OCR

aether.title: Aether lang
aether.description: A lisp interpreter written in haskell

yaml-transformer.title: Yaml transformer
yaml-transformer.description: A cli to update yaml properties while preserving whitespace and comments in its original state

edible-desmos.title: Desmos graph manager
edible-desmos.description: A personal graph manager using desmos graphing calculator

react-is-a-programming-language.title: React is a programming language
react-is-a-programming-language.description: A PoC for using react to emulate turing complete behaviors and building a "programming language" from it

css-everything.title: CSS everything framework
css-everything.description: An experimental/gag ui framework where you only write turing complete CSS. No HTML, no JS, no build system. Just CSS

ts-typeslang.title: Runtime for TS types
ts-typeslang.description: A runtime and library for typescript's types that turns the type system into a general purpose, purely functional programming language!

ts-theorem-provinator.title: TS types theorem prover
ts-theorem-provinator.description: A simple (terrible) theorem proof embedding in typescript's type system

esbuild-plugin-elm.title: esbuild-plugin-elm
esbuild-plugin-elm.description: An esbuild plugin for building elm projects

cmp-graphql.title: cmp-graphql for neovim
cmp-graphql.description: A neovim completions (nvim-cmp) plugin for schema-based completions for graphql syntax (works inside gql tagged template literals)

elxr.title: Elxr (list expressions)
elxr.description: An implementation of a regex-like syntax that generalizes regex operations for any sequential data structure

typed-regex.title: Typed RegEx
typed-regex.description: A typescript library for automatic type inference on regular expressions using named capture groups

algebraic-effects.title: Algebraic Effects
algebraic-effects.description: An implementation of algebraic effects in javascript as a library for managing side-effects in a pure and composable way

is-a-dev.title: is-a.dev
is-a-dev.description: A free and open source service for developers to register a .is-a.dev subdomain for their personal websites

enum-fp.title: EnumFP
enum-fp.description: A js library for defining functional Enum type / Sum type for javascript with simple pattern matching

shotkey.title: Shotkey
shotkey.description: Hotkey daemon for X11 window managers

bsp-layout.title: bsp-layout
bsp-layout.description: A dynamic layout management script for bspwm

daft-launcher.title: Daft Launcher
daft-launcher.description: A minimalist, text-only launcher written in flutter which I use every day

daft-jukebox.title: Daft Jukebox
daft-jukebox.description: An esp32 microcontroller powered mp3 player

plasmajs.title: PlasmaJS
plasmajs.description: An isomorphic NodeJS framework powered with React for building web apps. It has features like declarative syntax, isomorphic routing, isolated routing for building REST APIs, middlewares, ES2015 syntax with babel

pipey.title: Pipey
pipey.description: A js library for creating pipeline operator ready functions by converting instance methods's to context-free functions

diary-pwa.title: Diary PWA
diary-pwa.description: A progressive web app in go-lang that lets you carry a personalized secure diary in your pocket. Integrated pattern-lock-js library to allow for privacy

pattern-lock-js.title: Pattern Lock
pattern-lock-js.description: A js library for creating customizable pattern lock for the web and PWAs

h.title: H Kotlin
h.description: A simple, easy to use, library for HTML templating in kotlin
